scripts.verify-build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const dist=path.join(__dirname,'dist'); if(!fs.existsSync(dist) || fs.readdirSync(dist).length === 0) { console.error('Build output is empty or does not exist'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('Build output verified successfully'); }"
scripts.full-test: npm run build && npm run verify-build
